titleStmt.title: Newes out of the east, of the common enemy, who is yet in being in Hungaria and Austria. Or, a true account of the tryals and sufferings, jeopardies and tortourings, which Iohn Philly and William Moore passed through of late in the aforesaid countries
titleStmt.author: Caton, William, 1636-1665.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
